subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks forward Amar’e Stoudemire spent a portion of the off-season working with Hakeem Olajuwon, a Hall of Fame center, to develop his scoring ability in the post.
snippet: Knicks forward Amar’e Stoudemire spent a portion of the off-season working with Hakeem Olajuwon, a Hall of Fame center, to develop his scoring ability in the post.
